title: coinratinternal@gmail.com
author: coinratinternal@gmail.com
content: Reality Metaverse (RLTM) - Ico PresaleHistorically, the worlds of Web 2.0 and Web3 have operated independently. While Web 2.0 represents the widely-used internet of today, Web3 is a nascent decentralized arena that prioritizes both privacy and creation. Despite their unique functionalities and distinct activities, a recent mobile game called Landlord GO has managed to unite the two by offering users entertainment and contributors financial gains. Landlord GO leverages Reality NFTs that are produced within the Reality Metaverse.Reality Metaverse : https://icogems.com/ico/Reality-Metaverse
